ruleset.name: Apex Structure Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code structure and organization

rule.name: NoParameterClasses
rule.message: Classes or inner classes that only have attributes and constructors with no instance methods are not allowed
rule.description: Parameter classes (classes or inner classes that only have attributes and constructors with no instance methods) should not be created. Add instance methods to provide behavior, or refactor to use a different approach.
